plot outline: Parvathi, an honest lawyer and her short-tempered son Mohandas file a court case against Sharath Kaale - the arrogant son of wicked politician Prakash Kaale. Prakash, wanting to see his son as a successful politician, is not happy with the case filed by Parvathi. He begins to threaten Parvathi and Mohandas. Mohandas must now channel his anger and make logical use of law and order to put up a fight against Prakash.
title: Thayige thakka maga
plot: Parvathi, an honest lawyer and her short-tempered son Mohandas file a court case against Sharath Kaale - the arrogant son of wicked politician Prakash Kaale. Prakash, wanting to see his son as a successful politician, is not happy with the case filed by Parvathi. He begins to threaten Parvathi and Mohandas. Mohandas must now channel his anger and make logical use of law and order to put up a fight against Prakash.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
